DOC.brief_summary: This study compare three standard treatment program commonly offer patient breast cancer . The three program compare 1 ) Mindfulness Meditation-Based Stress Reduction ( MBSR ) , 2 ) Supportive- Expressive Group Therapy ( SET ) , 3 ) A one day stress-management seminar . The purpose study determine three treatment different effect psychological well-being , immune system , amount stress hormone bloodstream .
DOC.brief_title: Randomized Controlled Trial Comparing MBSR SET Breast Cancer Patients
DOC.criteria: Study participant must woman diagnose Stage I , II , III breast cancer within previous 18 month , complete treatment exception hormonal therapy least three month previously , age 18 , score 13 high BSI18 . Previous meditation/yoga experience allow record . Participants must concurrent DSMIV diagnosis psychosis , substance abuse , bipolar disorder , active suicidality ( assess structure clinical interview ) , must currently use psychotropic medication ( antipsychotic , antidepressant , anxiolytic ) , concurrent autoimmune disorder , participate previously MBSR SET group .
